parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.54

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Artillery

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Enable/disable the artillery engine. This allows the user to use the artillery computer on mortar/artillery, and for AI to use it for indirect fire.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''enableEngineArtillery''' enabled

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> enabled: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[enableEngineArtillery]] [[false]]; </code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[shownArtilleryComputer]], [[getArtilleryAmmo]], [[commandArtilleryFire]], [[doArtilleryFire]], [[getArtilleryComputerSettings]], [[getArtilleryETA]], [[inRangeOfArtillery]]
</value></part></template>
